doc.title: Introduction.
doc.plot: Cameraless animation perfectly synched to the eponymous 1969 track by The Flock (Rick Canoff, John Gerber, Fred Glickstein, Jerry Goodman, Ron Karpman, Frank Posa, Jerry Smith, Tom Webb). The cameraless technique was essentially invented by Lawrence Janiak, Garland's instructor, well known in experimental film circles.
